fields.name: template_width
fields.label: Theme Width
fields.tooltip: Specify the maximum base width for the theme to be visible on desktop computers.

fields.name: sidebar_width
fields.label: Sidebar Width
fields.tooltip: Specify the width of the theme sidebar as a percentage

fields.name: tablet_width
fields.label: Tablet Width
fields.tooltip: Specify the browser width when tablet.css is loaded. We recommend 800 pixels.

fields.name: mobile_width
fields.label: Mobile Width
fields.tooltip: Specify the browser width when mobile.css is loaded. We recommend 480 pixels

fields.name: head_code
fields.label: Code for the HEAD section
fields.tooltip: You can specify the code which will be added at the end of the HEAD section - it is useful when you need to add some additional metatags, scripts etc.

fields.name: footer_code
fields.label: Code for the footer section
fields.tooltip: You can specify the code which will be added before closing body tag - it is useful when you need to add some additional scripts, trackers etc.
